mapper.select: select o.ono, o.u_id,r.s_id, r.pname,r.content, o.order_date, o.pay from return_tbl as r join order_history_tbl as o on r.ono=o.ono where order_date like concat('%',#{click_date},'%') and s_id = #{s_id}
select substr(o.order_date,1,10) as order_date, count(*) as count from return_tbl as r join order_history_tbl as o on r.ono=o.ono where s_id=#{s_id} group by substr(o.order_date,1,10)
